verses.verse: מִזְמ֗וֹר <WH4210> miz-Mor, A Psalm לְדָ֫וִ֥ד <WH1732> le-Da-Vid of David יְהוָ֤ה׀ <WH3068> Yah-weh O LORD שְׁמַ֬ע <WH8085> she-Ma' Hear תְּפִלָּתִ֗י <WH8605> te-fil-la-Ti, my prayer הַאֲזִ֥ינָה <WH238> ha-'a-Zi-nah give ear אֶל־ <WH413> 'el- to תַּחֲנוּנַ֑י <WH8469> ta-cha-nu-Nai; to my supplications בֶּאֱמֻנָתְךָ֥ <WH530> be-'e-mu-na-te-Cha in thy faithfulness עֲ֝נֵ֗נִי <WH6030> 'a-Ne-ni, answer בְּצִדְקָתֶֽךָ׃ <WH6666> be-tzid-ka-Te-cha. me [and] in thy righteousness

וְאַל־ <WH408> ve-'al- not תָּב֣וֹא <WH935> ta-Vo And enter בְ֭מִשְׁפָּט <WH4941> Ve-mish-pot not into judgment אֶת־ <WH854> 'et- with עַבְדֶּ֑ךָ <WH5650> 'av-De-cha; with thy servant כִּ֤י <WH3588> ki for לֹֽא־ <WH3808> lo- no יִצְדַּ֖ק <WH6663> yitz-Dak be justified לְפָנֶ֣יךָ <WH6440> le-fa-Nei-cha for in thy sight כָל־ <WH3605> chol all manner חָֽי׃ <WH2416> Chai. shall no man living

כִּ֥י <WH3588> ki for רָ֘דַ֤ף <WH7291> ra-Daf hath persecuted אוֹיֵ֨ב׀ <WH341> o-Yev For the enemy נַפְשִׁ֗י <WH5315> naf-Shi, my soul דִּכָּ֣א <WH1792> dik-Ka down לָ֭אָרֶץ <WH776> La-'a-retz to the ground חַיָּתִ֑י <WH2416> chai-ya-Ti; my life הוֹשִׁיבַ֥נִי <WH3427> ho-shi-Va-ni he hath made me to dwell בְ֝מַחֲשַׁכִּ֗ים <WH4285> ve-ma-cha-shak-Kim, in darkness כְּמֵתֵ֥י <WH4191> ke-me-Tei dead עוֹלָֽם׃ <WH5769> o-Lam. as those that have been long

וַתִּתְעַטֵּ֣ף <WH5848> vat-tit-'at-Tef overwhelmed עָלַ֣י <WH5921> 'a-Lai within רוּחִ֑י <WH7307> ru-Chi; Therefore is my spirit בְּ֝תוֹכִ֗י <WH8432> be-to-Chi, within יִשְׁתּוֹמֵ֥ם <WH8074> yish-to-Mem me is desolate לִבִּֽי׃ <WH3820> lib-Bi. within me my heart

זָ֘כַ֤רְתִּי <WH2142> za-Char-ti I remember יָמִ֨ים׀ <WH3117> ya-Mim the days מִקֶּ֗דֶם <WH6924> mik-Ke-dem, of old הָגִ֥יתִי <WH1897> ha-Gi-ti I meditate בְכָל־ <WH3605> ve-chol- all פָּעֳלֶ֑ךָ <WH6467> po-'o-Le-cha; on all thy works בְּֽמַעֲשֵׂ֖ה <WH4639> be-ma-'a-Seh on the work יָדֶ֣יךָ <WH3027> ya-Dei-cha of thy hands אֲשׂוֹחֵֽחַ׃ <WH7878> a-so-Che-ach. I muse

פֵּרַ֣שְׂתִּי <WH6566> pe-Ras-ti I stretch forth יָדַ֣י <WH3027> ya-Dai my hands אֵלֶ֑יךָ <WH413> 'e-Lei-cha; to you נַפְשִׁ֓י׀ <WH5315> naf-Shi unto thee my soul כְּאֶֽרֶץ־ <WH776> ke-'e-retz- land עֲיֵפָ֖ה <WH5889> 'a-ye-Fah [thirsteth] after thee as a thirsty לְךָ֣ le-Cha סֶֽלָה׃ <WH5542> Se-lah. Selah

מַ֘הֵ֤ר <WH4118> ma-Her me speedily עֲנֵ֨נִי׀ <WH6030> 'a-Ne-ni Hear יְהוָה֮ <WH3068> Yah-weh O LORD כָּלְתָ֪ה <WH3615> kal-Tah faileth ר֫וּחִ֥י <WH7307> ru-Chi my spirit אַל־ <WH408> 'al- not תַּסְתֵּ֣ר <WH5641> tas-Ter hide פָּנֶ֣יךָ <WH6440> pa-Nei-cha not thy face מִמֶּ֑נִּי <WH4480> mi-Men-ni; at וְ֝נִמְשַׁ֗לְתִּי <WH4911> ve-nim-Shal-ti, from me lest I be like עִם־ <WH5973> 'im- who יֹ֥רְדֵי <WH3381> Yo-re-dei unto them that go down בֽוֹר׃ <WH953> Vor. into the pit

הַשְׁמִ֘יעֵ֤נִי <WH8085> hash-Mi-'E-ni Cause me to hear בַבֹּ֨קֶר׀ <WH1242> vab-Bo-ker in the morning חַסְדֶּךָ֮ <WH2617> chas-de-Cha thy lovingkindness כִּֽי־ <WH3588> ki- for בְךָ֪ ve-Cha בָ֫טָ֥חְתִּי <WH982> va-Ta-che-ti for in thee do I trust הוֹדִיעֵ֗נִי <WH3045> ho-di-'E-ni, cause me to know דֶּֽרֶךְ־ <WH1870> de-rech- the way ז֥וּ <WH2098> zu wherein אֵלֵ֑ךְ <WH1980> 'e-Lech; walk כִּֽי־ <WH3588> ki- for אֵ֝לֶיךָ <WH413> 'E-lei-cha to נָשָׂ֥אתִי <WH5375> na-Sa-ti for I lift up נַפְשִֽׁי׃ <WH5315> naf-Shi. my soul

הַצִּילֵ֖נִי <WH5337> hatz-tzi-Le-ni Deliver מֵאֹיְבַ֥י׀ <WH341> me-'o-ye-Vai from mine enemies יְהוָ֗ה <WH3068> Yah-weh me O LORD אֵלֶ֥יךָ <WH413> 'e-Lei-cha about כִסִּֽתִי׃ <WH3680> chis-Si-ti. I flee unto thee to hide

לַמְּדֵ֤נִי׀ <WH3925> lam-me-De-ni Teach לַֽעֲשׂ֣וֹת <WH6213> la-'a-Sot me to do רְצוֹנֶךָ֮ <WH7522> re-tzo-ne-Cha thy will כִּֽי־ <WH3588> ki- for אַתָּ֪ה <WH859> 'at-Tah you אֱל֫וֹהָ֥י <WH433> e-Lo-Hai God רוּחֲךָ֥ <WH7307> ru-cha-Cha thy spirit טוֹבָ֑ה <WH2896> to-Vah; [is] good תַּ֝נְחֵ֗נִי <WH5148> tan-Che-ni, lead בְּאֶ֣רֶץ <WH776> be-'E-retz me into the land מִישֽׁוֹר׃ <WH4334> mi-Shor. of uprightness

לְמַֽעַן־ <WH4616> le-ma-'an- the sake שִׁמְךָ֣ <WH8034> shim-Cha for thy name's יְהוָ֣ה <WH3068> Yah-weh me O LORD תְּחַיֵּ֑נִי <WH2421> te-chai-Ye-ni; Quicken בְּצִדְקָתְךָ֓׀ <WH6666> be-tzid-ka-te-Cha sake for thy righteousness' תוֹצִ֖יא <WH3318> to-Tzi sake bring מִצָּרָ֣ה <WH6869> mitz-tza-Rah out of trouble נַפְשִֽׁי׃ <WH5315> naf-Shi. my soul

וּֽבְחַסְדְּךָ֮ <WH2617> u-ve-chas-de-Cha And of thy mercy תַּצְמִ֪ית <WH6789> tatz-Mit cut off אֹ֫יְבָ֥י <WH341> 'o-ye-Vai mine enemies וְֽ֭הַאֲבַדְתָּ <WH6> Ve-ha-'a-vad-ta and destroy כָּל־ <WH3605> kol- all צֹרֲרֵ֣י <WH6887> tzo-ra-Rei all them that afflict נַפְשִׁ֑י <WH5315> naf-Shi; my soul כִּ֝֗י <WH3588> Ki, for אֲנִ֣י <WH589> 'a-Ni I עַבְדֶּֽךָ׃ <WH5650> 'av-De-cha. for I [am] thy servant
